data.title: Red Hot Chili Peppers, Ken Carson & IRONTOM Tickets
data.meta_description: Red Hot Chili Peppers, Ken Carson & IRONTOM on 31 May 2024 at Gorge Amphitheatre in Quincy, Washington. Tickets available. Click here to find out more.
data.text:
The rock Scoville units are acting up as the Red Hot Chili Peppers, with Ken Carson, and IRONTOM brings a backsplash of rock tunes to the capital state for their Unlimited Love Tour on Friday, May 31, 2024, at Gorge Amphitheater, Washington D.C. A night of full rock celebration is on notion as Red Hot Chili Peppers hit the road again for another timeless performance that will fill your emotions.

Wrapping the 2022 and 2023 tours with a blast, Red Hot Chili Peppers will extend the Unlimited Love Tour to 2024 as the 16-date tour will have its time for the Washington fans to relive their inner Red Hot Chili vibes as they hear the music of their idols on their hometown.

The return of the band's guitarist, John Frusciante, lights the blazing fire of the band as the members Flea (bass), Chad Smith (drums), and Anthony Kiedis (vocalist) bring all their might for a performance of a lifetime. Bringing the songs Californication, Under The Bridge, and Scar Tissue, the award-winning band will quench the rock-thirsty musical ears of the fans waiting for this one-time moment with Red Hot Chili Peppers.

Performing with Red Hot Chili Peppers are the renowned artists Ken Carson and IRONTOM. The Hip Hop and trap musician Ken Carson will wield his musical passion as he takes the stage with his avant-garde tunes. Known for the song Fighting My Demons, Yale, and Jenniferâ€™s Body, Ken Carson is in the zone for a hype musical beat for keeps. The indie-rock band IRONTOM will also bring the storm as they bring their hit songs Big Shot, Kid Midnight, and Call Me The West, adding post-punk and psychedelic music to the table as Red Hot Chili Peppers brings the main course for a night of musical celebration.

Gorge Amphitheatre will be the venue for the Unlimited Love Tour brought by Red Hot Chili Peppers. With its flexible event space, a cozy VIP club, and an open-air amphitheater equipped with the best of the best production and facilities, the 27,000 fans will have an all-out stance as the Red Hot Chili Peppers is in their music trance for a night you will never forget. Secure the dates and grab your tickets now!
